attributes.action: Look why mental health system is failing so many people who really need help
attributes.additional_details: Because people with mental health are suffering and getting worse to a point where there is no turning back and end up killing then selves or harm them or others
attributes.background: To work with the nhs mental health to support people who need help what ever the situation and not just turn people away and also provide a better level of care.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand you would like to see changes to the healthcare system relating to mental health and the way people are supported but we're not sure exactly what action you'd like the Government or Parliament to take.

You could start a new petition calling for a review of a certain area of the mental healthcare system, if this is something you would like to happen. Or you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We currently have the following petitions open on this topic which you might like to sign:

Increase funding for all mental health services
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/634345

Review Child and Adolescent Mental Health Services (CAMHS)
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631684
